Last Class was godly punishments ![[Myth - 10-2-24]]
[[Homework]] was to read the deucalion and pyrria story
	![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
	basically [[Zeus]] was all mad that humans were wiked so he sent a flood to kill everyone, prometheus overheard him and was able to warn his son and daughter in-law in time for them to build a boat, when the floods came they hoped ion their boat till it passed and they washed ashore on [[Mount Parnassus]]
	[[Zeus]] saw them being good so he let them live, they found the oracle cave of <[[Delphi]]> and the oracle said to "throw your mothers bones over your shoulder" the wife was hesitant because it would be disgracing the dead the husband started throwing rocks over his head because he saw that mother earth was his true mother, when the rocks landed they turned into kids that repopulated the earth.
	NEARLY IDENTICAL TO [[Noah's Ark]]

finishing the [[Prometheus]] story/play
	jungs colective unconceuis has floods and thats why noahs arc and Deucalion are so similar and thats the root of all the similarities in different myths across the world

Feutre seers
	sible at kumai
		appolo loves sibble
		sibble says no cause she knows better than to trust the gods
		apolow offers gift
		apolo gives her eternal life 
		apollo lets her kep gift after breakup
		ages farther
		*Wished for eternal life not eternal youth*
		can see the past so closly that she can see the futers
